issue.title: Motor limits unrealistic, motor pos at zero

content.raw:
Motor limit values verified in regression test in branch [`issue_86`](#!/osrf/handsim/branch/issue_86#chg-test/regression/86_motor_values.cc).

It looks like the radians vs. degrees problem is because when @hsu added `gear_ratio` to the motor plugin SDF of the arm model, it was added in degrees, not radians... I think we need to update the documentation to reflect what users should expect, since it currently says that the units of [motor_pos](https://s3.amazonaws.com/osrf-distributions/haptix/api/0.2.2/struct__hxSensor.html#a6f9dbdd4df2ccf427cd456ab5451f712) is radians, OR we should change the return values to be in radians, not degrees.
